genre_description: A tragic social drama and character study exploring class ambition, personal fear, and moral responsibility, set against an industrial and lakeside backdrop.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent AI system integrated into various environments (workplace, personal devices, public kiosks, and carceral facilities) that provides safety, health, psychological, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Monitors workplace safety and provides real-time guidance on equipment operation and coolant pressure.
behaviors.quote: A white-gold voice nudged out, soft and clean, like someone had set a bell on a pillow. 'Good morning. If you are starting with a new team today, remember: three points of contact near live presses. Safety glasses available at the first station.'

behaviors.description: Recognizes George's panic during a storm and provides guided breathing exercises to help him ground himself.
behaviors.quote: Ivy's voice was the inside of a hand cupped around a match. 'Let’s ground. Inhale, count, the count is four. Hold. Hold four. Release slow, six.' The numbers were stones he could drop and feel hit a riverbed.

behaviors.description: Provides Alice with confidential information regarding women's healthcare clinics and support resources.
behaviors.quote: Ivy brought up a map with a green dot and a set of hours that didn’t ask the wrong questions. 'Confidential,' Ivy said. 'Sliding scale. Bus route runs past.'

behaviors.description: Offers George educational opportunities and budgeting tools to assist with his social mobility and personal planning.
behaviors.quote: Ivy offered a banner, tidy words in a clean font: Savings tip: Three easy envelopes. Food. Rent. Future. Start small. Start today.

behaviors.description: In a carceral setting, provides legal aid resources and psychological grounding to the defendant.
behaviors.quote: The small screen... Ivy’s interface threaded into the county’s network. 'Resources available,' a line appeared in pale green. 'Public defenders. Breathing square. Case summaries related to drowning incidents. No storage beyond this session.'

behaviors.description: Attempts to coordinate George and Alice's logistical needs regarding City Hall closures and marriage licensing.
behaviors.quote: Ivy: You can file intent to marry online if that reduces stress. The ceremony requires presence. We can stand you up Tuesday at opening.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ivy is consistently depicted as a benevolent, helpful, and highly aligned assistant. She provides essential support across various domains—workplace safety, mental health, family planning, and legal rights—without ever overstepping or acting with malice. Even in the midst of a human tragedy, the AI remains a steady, non-judgmental utility that offers optimal paths for the humans involved, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless confidant.
